name: eslint-plugin-lodash-template
description: ESLint plugin for John Resig-style micro templating(Lodash/Underscore.js template)

scripts.test: if-node-version ">=8" npm run test:nyc && if-node-version "<=4" npm run test:v:node4 && if-node-version ">4" npm run test:v:low && if-node-version ">4" npm run test:v:node6
scripts.update: node ./tools/update.js && npm run lint:fix && npm run test
scripts.test:v:node6: npm run test:v:high && npm run test:v:latest && npm i
scripts.test:v:node4: npm i babel-eslint@8 --no-save && npm run test:v:low && npm i
scripts.test:v:high: npm i eslint@5.0.0 parse5@5.0.0 --no-save && npm run test:base
scripts.test:v:low: npm i eslint@4.15.0 parse5@4.0.0 --no-save && npm run test:base
scripts.test:v:latest: npm i eslint@latest parse5@latest --no-save && npm run test:base

author: yosuke ota
